metadata.name: policy_engine
metadata.description: The Policy Registry Program (PRP) enables the creation of policies that can be used to control the flow of funds in a programmatic way.

errors.name: PolicyEngineFull
errors.msg: Policy registry is full, cannot add more policies

errors.name: ForceFullTransfer
errors.msg: Expected source account to transfer full amount

fields.name: identity_registry
docs: identity registry to which the account belongs

fields.name: num_wallets
docs: number of wallets attached to this identity account

fields.name: issuance_policies
docs: these are partially for storage only

fields.name: policies
docs: policies to check on transfers or balance changes

fields.name: counters
docs: counters to track the number of holders depending on filters

fields.name: counter_limits
docs: limits to apply on existing counters
